Content.Text:
<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. How are you
today?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. How's your work
going?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. How are you?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. How's the farm?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good evening, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. How was work
today?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Are all your farm
chores done?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It certainly is a beautiful day, isn't it? I hope to
see quite a crowd at the Trade Depot today.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a shame there's so much rain today. It's hard
to draw a crowd in this kind of weather.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...My, but it's warm today. I wonder if it might
be cooler up on the mountain.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's a shame there's so much rain today. It's hard
to draw a crowd in this kind of weather.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's a beautiful autumn day, isn't it? A perfect day
for plenty of good, hard work.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Autumn rains can be very cold. Be careful you
don't catch a chill.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, I love that crisp, clean air!
<PAGE>
But take care when you're walking in the
mountains today, or you might catch a chill.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The road can get very slippery when it snows
like this. Watch your step.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's best not to go out in this weather. Too many
hazards, and if you get hurt, what then?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wandering about in the snow is an easy way to
wind up lost and stranded. Best to stay home
instead on days like this.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, I hear you've been spending quite a
bit of time with someone.
<PAGE>
Not to be nosy, but please do keep the guild
informed. We'll throw you a wonderful wedding
party, should the occasion arise.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I sometimes come here and talk with Madam 
Eda. It's very relaxing for me.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So many people from all over the world come
together at the inn. It's always so much fun to
talk with everyone.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I cherish every moment I get to spend with my
daughter. Since we both work, it's hard to find
the time...but important that we always do.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I rely on Gunther to fix the guild house and keep
up with maintenance at the Trade Depot.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Madam Eda once told me that spirits live in this
forest. She says they've been here for ages.
<PAGE>
...And honestly, if I were a spirit, I think I'd haunt
this beautiful place too. I can think of nowhere
else more lovely to roam!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I believe we're around the fourth station right
now. The air is so fresh and clean, and the wind
on your skin feels fantastic, doesn't it?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are plenty of fish in the river here. It's a
rather popular fishing spot.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a widely used walking trail, since it's so
close to the town and has such a beautiful view.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The air is much fresher up here than it is back in
town, isn't it?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fritz and Giorgio are working so hard these days.
I'm so glad their work is paying off.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This area is called <GREEN>Mountain Hill</GREEN>. Tea leaves and
fruit trees grow well here.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's quality soil here, and the view is quite
nice. Well worth the climb.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm lending this place to Madam Eda, though in
retrospect, making her trudge back and forth all
this way may not have been the best idea...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This area is called <GREEN>Harvest Plaza</GREEN>. It's well-suited
for beekeeping and growing mushrooms.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Many kinds of crops grow well here, particularly
flowers and tall vegetables.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a beautiful flower garden. Giorgio
certainly lives up to his reputation. I'm glad to
lend this place to him.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This area is called <GREEN>Zephyr Hill</GREEN>. It's a good place
to grow vegetables.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
As you can see, this field is prime farming land.
Vegetables always grow well here.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It seems Fritz is working as hard as anyone. His
vegetables are looking fine and healthy.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This area is called <GREEN>Riverside Pasture</GREEN>. Rice and
wheat both grow well here.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The water wheel lends this place a very pleasant
ambiance. It's a popular fishing spot as well.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Elise is growing rice here for the time being.
Don't let her looks fool you; she's not above hard
manual labor.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How's your farm? If you need more land, please
just say the word.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since I'm always working at the guild, I rarely
have a chance to go out. That's why I make an
effort to walk whenever I can.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How's the farm treating you? Don't push yourself
too hard when you're first starting out.
<PAGE>
Once your farm begins to grow, it'll grow on you
as well. That's when you'll start to enjoy the
work.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, would you say you're happy with
your job?
<PAGE>
I am. I take pride in my work as Guild Master.
<PAGE>
I do my best to improve people's lives all across
town.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you growing accustomed to the work? It's
hard, of course, but you can take your time and
learn everything little by little.
<PAGE>
And as you go, you can always enjoy the
benefits of your life here. A slow, comfortable
pace, surrounded by nature...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I consider all the people of this town, including
you, to be my close friends. Perhaps...more like
family, really.
<PAGE>
I want to help bring all of us together, especially
the farmers, to develop the town to its fullest.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Helping the town's economy grow is one part of
the guild's mission, but there's more to it than
that. 
<PAGE>
By encouraging trade, I hope to let more people
know about this town and thus deepen our
exchanges with the outside world.
<PAGE>
Forging bonds between people, regardless of
distance, is a crucial task for all our sakes. Just
imagine this town as a worldwide trading hub.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My family has overseen the town's growth and
trade since the old days.
<PAGE>
When my father grew too old, my husband
became the town Guild Master. He carried that
duty for the rest of his life.
<PAGE>
He dreamed of building a worldwide trade
network that runs through this town. Then, ten
years ago, he took ill and passed away.
<PAGE>
Ever since then, I've worked to make his dream a
reality. And I deeply appreciate your help.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You've worked so hard ever since you first
moved here.
<PAGE>
What you've done for us is plain to see, all over
town. On behalf of everyone, including me,
thank you from the bottom of my heart.
<PAGE>
Let's all continue to give it our best every day.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, how did you know this was my very
favorite?
<PAGE>
I'm flattered. Thank you very much.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, you're giving this to me? Well, thank you
very much!
<PAGE>
I can hardly refuse such a kind offer. Thank you!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, this is quite nice. Thank you very much.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Is this a present for me? Thank you very much.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh... This is... Well, all right. I'll take it. Thank
you.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hrrrm... Wait, you're giving this to me?
I...suppose I'll take it...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...?! G-get that thing away!
<PAGE>
...What? Y-you're giving it to me...?! I have no
choice, do I...? All right. I'll keep my eyes
closed. Just...put it down someplace.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Look how shiny it is. You're giving this to me?
Thank you very much.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Amazing how it glows... Well, if you're giving
this to me, I certainly won't say no. Thank you.
Let's not give her a present right now.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You don't have to try so hard to be kind...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, thank you very much for offering, but I'd
only feel guilty if I accepted this much from you
this quickly...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hmm? A birthday present for me?! Oh, it is my
birthday, isn't it? Another year older...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Ah, never mind that. You brought me my
favorite! How did you know?
<PAGE>
You're so kind. Thank you very much!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, I like this, I do! ...Hmm? It's a birthday
present?!
<PAGE>
Oh, it IS my birthday, isn't it? I must have
blocked it out of my memory. Thank you very
much.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>, I see. I like it. ...A
birthday present?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Oh, today's my birthday?! ...Another year older.
Well, never mind that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Thank you very much. My birthday; I'd
completely forgotten.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What? A birthday present?! Oh, it is my birthday,
isn't it? Another year older, again...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, no, I didn't say anything. Thank you very
much for your kindness.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? Is this for me...? A birthday present...?
Thank you very much.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Huh...? You brought a present for my birthday?!
...You brought me this <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>
for my birthday?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>W-well, it's a gift, so I suppose I can't exactly
say no. Thank you for remembering.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...?! G-get that thing away!
<PAGE>
...What? Y-you're giving it to me...?! I have no
choice, do I...? All right. I'll keep my eyes
closed. Just...put it down someplace.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Is this for my birthday? That shine is
absolutely gorgeous. Thank you very much.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Is this for my birthday? It looks gorgeous,
but...  A-anyway, thank you...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, what an adorable rabbit! There're so many
of them around here.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You shouldn't bully wild animals. Please be kind
to them.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that's an ermine, isn't it? Ermines are
common in this area.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You shouldn't bully wild animals. Please be kind
to them.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's an Angora rabbit, isn't it? That fur could
make a lovely outfit, no doubt.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please raise that little chick carefully.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This chicken looks healthy and happy. I'm sure
its eggs are delicious.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, what a cute dog.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...You know, I do think that dog is a bit too
heavy. You'd do well to pay attention to its diet.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now that is one keen-looking animal.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Your dog is clearly overweight. You ought to
restrict its diet.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a gorgeous cat! I envy cats sometimes,
you know. Always roaming wherever they
please, not a care in the world...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a very cute cat, but it's a bit on the round
side. You may want to curb its diet a bit.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now there's a pretty cat. I like the coat. Very
smooth.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a very cute cat, but it's a bit on the round
side. You may want to curb its diet a bit.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Such a beautiful flower. Is this for the Flower
Fair, by any chance? Thank you very much.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A blue feather, yes? You should give it to
someone important to you.
<PAGE>
And if they accept it, please come to the guild
to plan the wedding ceremony. I'll be waiting for
you both.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A ring, I see. You should give that to someone
important to you.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
How cute! I like the way you wrapped it. I
wonder what's inside.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, you took the time to wrap a gift for me?
That's thoughtful of you. Thank you! Now, what
could be inside...?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday! Here, a gift from me. Please
accept it.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today's your birthday, isn't it? Happy birthday.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>... It's been a while, hasn't it?
<PAGE>
You always look so busy, but come talk to me
sometime, won't you?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That apron looks well-suited to farm work. You
look like a craftsman.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That blue-and-white combination looks good on
you. It's almost a shame to get it dirty.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
As women's work outfits go, that one's rather
cute, isn't it?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, you look all dressed up and ready for work!
That outfit suits you well.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, you look all dressed up and ready for work!
That outfit looks cute on you.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a classic farmer outfit you've got on. It's a
good look for you, don't you think?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a classic farmer outfit you've got on. It's a
good look for you, don't you think?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a very nice blue skirt, and not just
because it's pretty. It goes well with your farm, I
think.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well now, that's a new outfit. It looks easy to
move in, and I like that color.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That down jacket is my favorite color, and it
looks warm, too.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, look at you, all dressed up. Are you going
somewhere?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, look at you, all dressed up. Are you going
somewhere?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That...hoodie, I believe, looks rather good on
you. Especially in that color.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My, aren't we classy today? What's the
occasion?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like that knitted cardigan. The color goes along
well with the pattern. Very fashionable.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You look like you're...going out somewhere
today. Am I right?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a cute poncho. I like the color.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Could I borrow that animal costume of yours for
the next town event? I'm sure the crowd will
love it.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Could I borrow that animal costume of yours for
the next big event? I'm sure the crowd will love
it.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It must be hard to walk in that. ...Is there some
costume party I missed an announcement for?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's a good-looking hat. I'd say it fits your
farming lifestyle well, too.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, that's a nice hat. You look great in blue.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That hat simply shouts out "farmer," doesn't it? I
like the color, too.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That hat is very farmer-like. It looks good on
you.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aww, look at the big black kitty! I love cats.
You're adorable.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aww, look at the big white kitty! I love cats.
You're adorable.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like those glasses. The blue frame looks quite
fashionable.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like those glasses. The blue frame looks quite
fashionable.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like those glasses. The blue frame looks quite
fashionable.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Those sunglasses are...highly amusing. They'd
fit in well at a costume party, I'd say.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you need something, please talk to me across
the counter.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
An...gela... Where are you going...? Angela...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry, but the hour's a bit late already. Some
other time, shall we say?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry, I haven't got much time to eat this. Give
me a moment, if you'd be so kind.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a lovely-looking bench. Green's my other
favorite color besides blue, you know.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a lovely-looking bench. Blue's my favorite
color, you know.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like alabaster pottery. It helps build a very clean
sort of ambiance.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, there should be street lamps like this on
the mountain paths. It'd certainly make them
much safer to walk at night...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A fine table. I should order one just like it for the
guild.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Trade Depot should have a garden chair like
that one. People would have a chance to rest
there, then.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Trade Depot should have a set-up like this
garden parasol. People would have a chance to
rest there, then.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, I think if our town had a few more
signs, it would add character.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ooh, I should install a blackboard at the guild.
Then I could post all the latest rates and
figures...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A big statue like that would make a nice town
landmark, wouldn't it?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A big statue like that would make a nice town
landmark, wouldn't it?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When there's a fountain in a plaza, people
naturally gravitate toward it. That's always a
pleasure to see.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Watchtowers are good for more than keeping
watch. They also provide a beautiful view of the
town.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Something about this kind of wooden plaza
always brings me warmth and comfort.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Apparently, daruma dolls attract good fortune in
business... I should put one up on display at the
guild.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This tree looks very beautiful, and blue IS my
favorite color, after all.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a nice-looking pole, and blue IS my
favorite color, after all.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a very inviting gate. Blue is my favorite
color, you know.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...My, I wonder what that stone marker is
saying... It's intriguing, to say the least.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Gentians are my favorite flowers. If they blossom
in a group, their beauty is even more radiant.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Where did you find these blue roses? They're
very rare, you know. I hope you'll take exquisite
care of them.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Gentians are my favorite flowers. If they blossom
in a group, their beauty is even more radiant.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Where did you find these blue roses? They're
very rare, you know. I hope you'll take exquisite
care of them.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Such a beautiful flower basket. Imagine the
flourish of color everywhere if we put them all
around town.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's just the kind of conifer I want for my
house, too.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can picture a cherry blossom tree just like that
one waving on the mountaintop. So beautiful.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm so impressed by the workmanship of this
horse statue. Look at how lifelike it seems.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I want a flower arch like that in the streets of the
town. It would add such color, wouldn't it?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like this fence, and blue IS my favorite color, of
course.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
My favorite color is blue. It always looks so
clean and calm...
<PAGE>
It's safe to say this is my new favorite place. I'm
sure you didn't add this blue here just for me,
but I'm very glad it's here.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Being surrounded by the color green helps me
relax. I've been busy these days and the stress,
well...it has been piling up, so...
<PAGE>
...looking at all the decorations you've chosen,
it's...centered me again, you might say. Thank
you very much.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well now, this is unique, isn't it? I've never seen
anything like it in Oak Tree Town. I didn't even
know such a thing existed.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I feel like I'm looking back at old Oak Tree Town,
back when it was quieter. Ah, memories...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this what tropical islands are like?
<PAGE>
Just looking at this place brightens up my whole
disposition. I want to call everyone and have a
party.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This water theme is quite nice, isn't it? Very
relaxing. I hope the town comes here to share
the enjoyment.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can buy almost all the general goods you
need at Silk Country's stall.
<PAGE>
The more you deal with the merchant there, the
more they'll have in stock.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can buy many kinds of yarn at Cabin
Country's stall.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sakura Country's rice is incomparable, just so
you know.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you want to buy grain, you should go to
Wheat Country's stall.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Rose Country has a full stock of delicious wines.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can buy all kinds of delicious fruit at
Tropical Country's stall.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ice Country is famous for its rare materials...and
its penguin costumes, of course.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You seem to be expanding your territory. Keep it
up!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can't expand your territory anymore, but you
can still improve the area by installing facilities
or reorganizing. Give it your best!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We have a newcomer. Please give them a warm
Oak Tree Town welcome.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks to all of you, this town has gained
worldwide renown. Travelers come here from all
across the globe now.
<PAGE>
By the way, I understand that each country has
particular fondnesses for certain products such
as seeds, crops, food, and crafts.
<PAGE>
If you ship large amounts of these things, other
countries may continue to develop an interest in
our town.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've all helped this town become famous.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My dream is to build this town up into a thriving
center of commerce.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
More people do seem to be coming to town
these days.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We're a small country town, but if we all strive
together, we can build it into something more,
something everyone will come to see.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's this town, and there's the thriving utopia
I've always dreamed of...and now, I think they
just might be one and the same.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here's today's allowance. Use it well.
